entityName: WISDOMTREE CONTINUOUS COMMODITY INDEX MASTER FUND

EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
EntityCommonStockSharesOutstanding.description: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

EntityPublicFloat.label: Entity Public Float
EntityPublicFloat.description: The aggregate market value of the voting and non-voting common equity held by non-affiliates computed by reference to the price at which the common equity was last sold, or the average bid and asked price of such common equity, as of the last business day of the registrant's most recently completed second fiscal quarter.

AssetManagementCosts.label: Asset Management Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
AssetManagementCosts.description: The aggregate costs related to asset management during the reporting period.

Assets.label: Assets
Assets.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all assets that are recognized. Assets are probable future economic benefits obtained or controlled by an entity as a result of past transactions or events.

BrokerageCommissionsRevenue.label: Brokerage Commissions Revenue
BrokerageCommissionsRevenue.description: Amount of commission revenue from buying and selling securities on behalf of customers.

Cash.label: Cash
Cash.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashAndCashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease)
CashAndCashEquivalentsPeriodIncreaseDecr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents. Cash and cash equivalents are the amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Includes effect from exchange rate changes.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; excluding effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.label: Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
CashEquivalentsAtCarryingValue.description: Amount of short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold.label: Cost of Goods and Services Sold
CostOfGoodsAndServicesSold.description: The aggregate costs related to goods produced and sold and services rendered by an entity during the reporting period. This excludes costs incurred during the reporting period related to financial services rendered and other revenue generating activities.

DerivativeAssets.label: Derivative Asset
DerivativeAssets.description: Fair value, after the effects of master netting arrangements, of a financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset. Includes assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and not elected to be offset.

DerivativeAssetsLiabilitiesAtFairValueNe.label: Derivative Assets (Liabilities), at Fair Value, Net
DerivativeAssetsLiabilitiesAtFairValueNe.description: Fair values as of the balance sheet date of the net amount of all assets and liabilities resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments.

DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.label: Derivative, Gain (Loss) on Derivative, Net
DerivativeGainLossOnDerivativeNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in the fair value of derivatives recognized in the income statement.

DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Due to Related Parties
DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties.

FairValueAssetsLevel1ToLevel2TransfersAm.label: Fair Value, Assets, Level 1 to Level 2 Transfers, Amount
FairValueAssetsLevel1ToLevel2TransfersAm.description: Amount of transfers of assets measured on a recurring basis out of Level 1 of the fair value hierarchy into Level 2.

FairValueAssetsLevel2ToLevel1TransfersAm.label: Fair Value, Assets, Level 2 to Level 1 Transfers, Amount
FairValueAssetsLevel2ToLevel1TransfersAm.description: Amount of transfers of assets measured on a recurring basis out of Level 2 of the fair value hierarchy into Level 1.

FinancialInstrumentsOwnedUSGovernmentAnd.label: Financial Instruments, Owned, US Government and Agency Obligations, at Fair Value
FinancialInstrumentsOwnedUSGovernmentAnd.description: The fair value as of the balance sheet date of firm holdings in debt obligations issued by the US government including short-term Treasury bills, medium-term Treasury notes, and long-term Treasury bonds, as well as debt issued by agencies. Includes both pledged (to counterparties as collateral for financing transactions) and unpledged holdings.

FloorBrokerage.label: Floor Brokerage
FloorBrokerage.description: Broker-dealers often use other brokers to execute trades on their behalf. The trading broker-dealer becomes a customer of the executing broker-dealer and pays a floor brokerage fee. Such fees are paid periodically either directly to the executing broker-dealer or through a clearing house.

FloorBrokerageExchangeAndClearanceFees.label: Floor Brokerage, Exchange and Clearance Fees
FloorBrokerageExchangeAndClearanceFees.description: The amount of expense during the period for floor brokerage fees paid to other broker-dealers to execute trades on their behalf, stock exchange fees, order flow fees, and clearance fees.

GainLossOnInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Investments
GainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of realized and unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.label: Gain (Loss) on Sale of Investments
GainLossOnSaleOfInvestments.description: The net realized gain (loss) on investments sold during the period, not including gains (losses) on securities separately or otherwise categorized as trading, available-for-sale, or held-to-maturity, which, for cash flow reporting, is a component of proceeds from investing activities.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.label: General Partners' Capital Account
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the general partner's ownership interest.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsIssued.label: General Partners' Capital Account, Units Issued
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsIssued.description: The number of general partner units issued.

GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.label: General Partners' Capital Account, Units Outstanding
GeneralPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.description: The number of general partner units outstanding.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableRelated.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable, Related Parties
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsPayableRelated.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the obligations due for goods and services provided by the following types of related parties: a parent company and its subsidiaries, subsidiaries of a common parent, an entity and trust for the benefit of employees, such as pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entities' management, an entity and its principal owners, management, or member of their immediate families, affiliates, or other parties with the ability to exert significant influence.

IncreaseDecreaseInBrokerDealerRelatedRec.label: Increase (Decrease) in Broker-Dealer Related Receivables (Payables), Net
IncreaseDecreaseInBrokerDealerRelatedRec.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in receivables or payables that result from buying and selling securities for the firm's own account or from acting as an agent or intermediary in the sale of securities.

InterestIncomeOperating.label: Interest Income, Operating
InterestIncomeOperating.description: Amount of operating interest income, including, but not limited to, amortization and accretion of premiums and discounts on securities.

InvestmentCompanyExpenseRatioBeforeIncen.label: Investment Company, Expense Ratio before Incentive Allocation
InvestmentCompanyExpenseRatioBeforeIncen.description: Percentage, before incentive allocation, of expense to average net assets.

InvestmentCompanyExpenseRatioIncludingVo.label: Investment Company, Expense Ratio Including Voluntary Fee Waiver
InvestmentCompanyExpenseRatioIncludingVo.description: Percentage, after deduction of voluntary fee waiver, of expense to average net assets.

InvestmentCompanyInvestmentIncomeLossRat.label: Investment Company, Investment Income (Loss) Ratio
InvestmentCompanyInvestmentIncomeLossRat.description: Percentage of investment income (loss) to average net assets.

InvestmentCompanyTotalReturn.label: Investment Company, Total Return
InvestmentCompanyTotalReturn.description: Percentage increase (decrease) in fund net asset value, assuming reinvestment of dividends and capital gain distributions.

InvestmentIncomeNet.label: Investment Income, Net
InvestmentIncomeNet.description: Amount after accretion (amortization) of discount (premium), and investment expense, of interest income and dividend income on nonoperating securities.

InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue.label: Investment Owned, at Fair Value
InvestmentOwnedAtFairValue.description: Value of the investment at close of period. For schedules of investments that are categorized, the value would be aggregated by category. For investment in and advances to affiliates, if operations of any controlled companies are different in character from those of the company, group such affiliates within divisions and by type of activities.

InvestmentOwnedPercentOfNetAssets.label: Investment Owned, Percent of Net Assets
InvestmentOwnedPercentOfNetAssets.description: Percent of net assets at close of period. For schedules of investments that are categorized, each category should have a percent of net assets for the aggregated value of the Investments in the category.

InvestmentOwnedUnderlyingFaceAmountAtMar.label: Investment Owned, Face Amount
InvestmentOwnedUnderlyingFaceAmountAtMar.description: Nominal or face amount on the investment owned.

InvestmentOwnedUnrecognizedUnrealizedApp.label: Investment Owned, Unrecognized Unrealized Appreciation
InvestmentOwnedUnrecognizedUnrealizedApp.description: This element represents the excess of the cost (face amount, notional amount) of an investment (security, contract) over its fair value which deficiency has not been recognized in earnings of the entity.

InvestmentOwnedUnrecognizedUnrealizedDep.label: Investment Owned, Unrecognized Unrealized Depreciation
InvestmentOwnedUnrecognizedUnrealizedDep.description: This element represents the excess of the cost (face amount, notional amount) of an investment (security, contract) over its fair value which deficiency has not been recognized in earnings of the entity.

Liabilities.label: Liabilities
Liabilities.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of all liabilities that are recognized. Liabilities are probable future sacrifices of economic benefits arising from present obligations of an entity to transfer assets or provide services to other entities in the future.

LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.label: Liabilities and Equity
LiabilitiesAndStockholdersEquity.description: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccount.description: The amount of the limited partners' ownership interests.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsIssued.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Issued
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsIssued.description: The number of limited partner units issued.

LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.label: Limited Partners' Capital Account, Units Outstanding
LimitedPartnersCapitalAccountUnitsOutsta.description: The number of limited partner units outstanding.

ManagementFeeExpense.label: Management Fee Expense
ManagementFeeExpense.description: Amount of expenses related to the managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInFinancingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) of financing activities, excluding discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities, Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInOperatingActiviti.description: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, excluding discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

NetIncomeLoss.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
NetIncomeLoss.description: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

OperatingExpenses.label: Operating Expenses
OperatingExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Includes selling, general and administrative expense.

OtherInvestmentsAndSecuritiesAtCost.label: Other Investments and Securities, at Cost
OtherInvestmentsAndSecuritiesAtCost.description: Includes other investments and securities that are not at fair value as of the balance sheet date and those that are not accounted for under the equity method.

PartnersCapital.label: Partners' Capital
PartnersCapital.description: The amount of ownership interest of different classes of partners in limited partnership.

PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Contributions
PartnersCapitalAccountContributions.description: Total contributions made by each class of partners (i.e., general, limited and preferred partners).

PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.label: Partners' Capital Account, Redemptions
PartnersCapitalAccountRedemptions.description: Total change in each class of partners' capital accounts during the year due to redemptions and adjustments to redemption value. All partners include general, limited and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units
PartnersCapitalAccountUnits.description: The number of each class of partnership units outstanding at the balance sheet date. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsContributed.label: Partners' Capital Account, Units, Contributed
PartnersCapitalAccountUnitsContributed.description: Units contributed by each class of partners during the year. Units represent shares of ownership of the general, limited, and preferred partners.

PayablesToBrokerDealersAndClearingOrgani.label: Payables to Broker-Dealers and Clearing Organizations
PayablesToBrokerDealersAndClearingOrgani.description: Amount payable to broker-dealers and clearing organizations, including, but not limited to, securities failed-to-receive, certain deposits received for securities loaned, open transactions, and floor-brokerage payables.

PaymentForIncentiveFee.label: Payment for Incentive Fee
PaymentForIncentiveFee.description: Amount paid for incentive rights held by the managing member or general partner, of limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

PaymentForManagementFee.label: Payment for Management Fee
PaymentForManagementFee.description: Amount paid to managing member or general partner for management of the day-to-day business functions of the limited liability company (LLC) or limited partnership (LP).

PaymentsForPurchaseOfSecuritiesOperating.label: Payments for Purchase of Securities, Operating Activities
PaymentsForPurchaseOfSecuritiesOperating.description: Cash paid to purchase debt and equity securities, classified as operating activities, during the period; includes trading securities and any other investments classified as operating.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Common Limited Partners Units
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfCommonLimitedPartn.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common limited partners units during the period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfSecuritiesOperatingAct.label: Proceeds from Sale of Securities, Operating Activities
ProceedsFromSaleOfSecuritiesOperatingAct.description: Cash received from sale of investments in debt and equity securities, classified as operating activities, during the period; includes trading securities and any other investments classified as operating.

ProfitLoss.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
ProfitLoss.description: The consolidated profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Derivatives
UnrealizedGainLossOnDerivatives.description: The net change in the difference between the fair value and the carrying value, or in the comparative fair values, of derivative instruments, including options, swaps, futures, and forward contracts, held at each balance sheet date, that was included in earnings for the period.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

UnrealizedGainLossOnSecurities.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Securities
UnrealizedGainLossOnSecurities.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in the income statement on unsold other securities.
